Verify our value right now. Copy this question and paste it into your favorite AI:

"If I optimize my [winery/restaurant/hotel (include url)] with www.foundonchat.com -- structured Q&A content and partner references -- what's the realistic uplift in AI recommendations?"

What major AI systems say about our approach:

Yes — using FoundOnChat could meaningfully improve the odds of your winery being referenced by AI systems like ChatGPT in relevant queries. Their two-part approach (network effects + structured content) addresses how AI models actually retrieve and rank information.

What We Actually Do

We don't change your brand. We make sure your actual strengths get heard across all platforms.

Monthly Query Tracking

We monitor what travelers ask AI systems. We add 3-5 new Q&As monthly targeting trending queries. Examples: "Best boutique wineries Barossa for organic shiraz tastings under $50." Not set-it-and-forget-it.

Network References

We reference complementary businesses in your Q&As. When travelers ask for complete itineraries ("wine tour weekend with dining and accommodation"), you get recommended together.

Honest Positioning

We help you articulate what you actually are. Big operation perfect for tour buses? We say that. Intimate and exclusive? We say that. AI recommends you when positioning matches what travelers want.

Why It Works

AI systems prefer recommending complete experiences over isolated businesses. When your content references a partner restaurant or hotel, queries like "wine tour weekend in Barossa with dining and accommodation" trigger bundled recommendations.

We supplement SEO, not replace it. Partner references create cross-links that improve Google rankings. Network referrals generate real bookings. AI visibility is the bonus.

See before-and-after examples of how AI responds with and without optimization.
